index.newPad:
Used as button text.
A pad, in the context of Etherpad, is a notepad, something to write on.
index.createOpenPad: label for an input field that allows the user to choose a custom name for his new pad. In case the pad already exists the user will be redirected to its url.
pad.toolbar.bold.title: Used as tooltip of button
pad.toolbar.italic.title: Used as tooltip of button
pad.toolbar.underline.title: Used as tooltip of button
pad.toolbar.strikethrough.title:
Used as tooltip of button.
{{Identical|Strikethrough}}
pad.toolbar.ol.title: Used as tooltip for button
pad.toolbar.ul.title: Used as tooltip for button
pad.toolbar.unindent.title:
Used as tooltip of button.

"TAB" refers to "Tab key".

See also:
* {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.toolbar.indent.title}}
pad.toolbar.undo.title: Used as tooltip of button
pad.toolbar.redo.title:
Used as tooltip of button
{{Identical|Redo}}
pad.toolbar.clearAuthorship.title: Used as tooltip of button
pad.toolbar.import_export.title: Used as tooltip of button
pad.toolbar.timeslider.title: The timeslider is a separate "page" that allows you to browse through the history of your pad's contents
pad.toolbar.savedRevision.title: Used as tooltip for button.
pad.toolbar.settings.title:
settings that determine how the pad content is displayed
{{Identical|Settings}}
pad.toolbar.embed.title: Used as tooltip for button
pad.toolbar.showusers.title: Used as tooltip for button
pad.loading:
Used to indicate the pad is being loaded.
{{Identical|Loading}}
pad.wrongPassword: Used as error message if the specified password is wrong.
pad.settings.padSettings: Used as heading of settings window
pad.settings.myView: Section heading for a users personal settings, meaning changes to the settings in this section will only affect the current view (this browser window) of the pad.
pad.settings.rtlcheck: Used as label for checkbox for RTL (right-to-left) languages
pad.settings.fontType.normal:
Used as an option in the "Font type" select box which is labeled {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.settings.fontType}}.
{{Identical|Normal}}
pad.settings.language:
This is a label for a select list of languages.
{{Identical|Language}}
pad.importExport.import_export:
Used as HTML

heading of window. Followed by the child heading {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.importExport.import}}.
pad.importExport.import:
Used as HTML

heading. Preceded by the parent heading {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.importExport.import_export}}.
pad.importExport.importSuccessful:
Used as success message to indicate that the pad has been imported successfully.
{{Identical|Successful}}
pad.importExport.exportword:
Used as link text, preceded by {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.importExport.export}}.
{{Related|Pad.importExport.export}}
pad.importExport.exportpdf:
Used as link text, preceded by {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.importExport.export}}.
{{Related|Pad.importExport.export}}
pad.importExport.exportopen:
Used as link text, preceded by {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.importExport.export}}.
{{Related|Pad.importExport.export}}
pad.importExport.abiword.innerHTML:
Used as intro text for the "Import file" form.

Preceded by the heading {{msg-etherpadlite|pad.importExport.import}}.
pad.modals.forcereconnect: Label of a button that will make the browser reconnect to the synchronization server.
pad.modals.userdup:
Used as HTML

heading to indicate that the pad is opened in another window on this computer. Followed by the following messages: * {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.userdup.explanation}} -

heading * {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.userdup.advice}}
pad.modals.userdup.explanation:
Used as HTML

heading. Preceded by the parent heading {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.userdup}}. Followed by the message {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.userdup.advice}}.
pad.modals.unauth.explanation:
Used to indicate that the user is not authorized.

Preceded by the heading {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.unauth}}.
pad.modals.looping.explanation:
Used as HTML

heading. Preceded by the parent heading {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.looping}}. Followed by the message {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.modals.looping.cause}}.
pad.share.link:
Used as label for a field providing URL of the pad.
{{Identical|Link}}
pad.share.emebdcode: Label for a field providing code that allows you to embed the pad into your website.
pad.chat:
Used as button text and as title of Chat window.
{{Identical|Chat}}
pad.chat.title: Used as tooltip for the Chat button
pad.chat.stick.title: Tooltip for the stick chat button
timeslider.pageTitle: {{doc-important|Please leave {{appTitle}} parameter untouched. It will be replaced by app title.}} Inserted into HTML title tag.
timeslider.toolbar.authors:
A list of Authors follows after the colon.
{{Identical|Author}}
timeslider.toolbar.authorsList: Displayed when there are no authors of the currently viewed revision.
timeslider.version: {{doc-important|Please leave <nowiki>{{version}}</nowiki> parameter untouched. It will be replaced with the version number}}
timeslider.saved: {{doc-important|Do not translate {{month}}, {{day}} and {{year}} parameters. These will be replaced.}} Parameters: * {{month}} - month name such as {{msg-etherpadlite|Timeslider.month.january}}, {{msg-etherpadlite|Timeslider.month.february}} and so on * {{day}} - day of the month (01-31) * {{year}} - year in 4 digit format
timeslider.dateformat: {{doc-important|Do not translate month, day, year, hours, minutes and seconds parameters. These will be replaced.}} * {{month}} - a month number (01-12), NOT {{msg-etherpadlite|Timeslider.month.january}} etc. * {{day}} - day of the month (01-31) * {{year}} - year in 4 digit format * {{hours}} - hours (00-23) * {{minutes}} - minutes (00-59) * {{seconds}} - seconds (00-59)
pad.userlist.entername: Used as placeholder for the "Name" input box in the upper right corner of the screen.
pad.userlist.unnamed: Displayed, if a user has not set a nick yet
pad.userlist.guest:
Preceded by the link text which is labeled {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.userlist.approve}}.
{{Identical|Guest}}
pad.userlist.deny:
Used as link text.

Followed by the link which is labeled {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.userlist.approve}}.
pad.userlist.approve:
Used as link text.

Preceded by the link which is labeled {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.userlist.deny}}.

Followed by the message {{msg-etherpadlite|Pad.userlist.guest}}.
{{Identical|Approve}}
pad.editbar.clearcolors: Used as confirmation message (JavaScript confirm() function). This message means "Are you sure you want to clear authorship colors on entire document? This cannot be undone".
pad.impexp.importbutton: Used as label for the Submit button.
pad.impexp.importing:
Used to indicate that the file is being imported.
{{Identical|Importing}}
pad.impexp.convertFailed: Used as error message when importing a file.
pad.impexp.uploadFailed:
Used as error message when uploading a file.

This message means "The upload has been failed. Please try again.".
pad.impexp.copypaste: Displayed in case the import failed
pad.impexp.exportdisabled: {{doc-important|Please leave <nowiki>{{type}}</nowiki> parameter untouched. It will be replaced}}
